rooms.description: Open living space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the west facade, incorporating Mediterranean styling elements such as stone finishes and terracotta tiles.
Modern kitchen integrated into the living area with a breakfast bar. Vastu principles applied by placing the sink in the north-east corner to ensure positive energy flow.
Master bedroom designed as a quiet retreat, featuring natural light and an en-suite bathroom adjoining the room. The entrance is oriented towards the east per Vastu guidelines for prosperity.
En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom with water-friendly fixtures, minimalistic design and adequate ventilation.

openings.notes: Floor-to-ceiling windows on the west facade to maximize natural light and complement Mediterranean aesthetics while maintaining privacy.
Main entrance door with security features, aligned according to Vastu recommendations for auspicious entry.

vastu_recommendations.north_east: Place water elements or dining area here.
vastu_recommendations.south_west: Ideal location for the kitchen and storage areas.
vastu_recommendations.east: Recommended for master bedroom entrance to harness positive energy.
vastu_recommendations.west: Optimized for leisure and relaxation spaces such as living room.
